flashside.name: Flashside
message.flashside.installCloth: Install Cloth Config API to access mod options
option.flashside.mc.leftSide.tooltip: Whether to place the Flashside buttons on the left, instead of the right.
option.flashside.mc.editTitleScreen.tool: Whether to, when in 'Left side' mode, move the Flashback button on the title screen.
option.flashside.mc.startRow.tooltip: Where the Flashside buttons will start (0 for the top row).
option.flashside.mc.modmenuIconTop.toolt: Whether to place the ModMenu button above the Flashside buttons.
